API pyWatermark¶

image¶

class package.api.image.CustomImage(path, margin=25, folder='output')[source]¶

Bases: object

The CustomImage class implements the image watermark operation.

Attributes:

image (Image): The image object from PIL.

width (int): The width of the image.

height (int): The height of the image.

path (str): The path of the image.

margin (int): The margin between the image border and the watermark.

output_path (str): The path of the watermarked image.

watermark_image(watermark_path, pos_name)[source]¶

Add an image watermark on the image. Supports only PNG and JPG files.

Parameters

  • watermark_path (str) – The path of the image watermark.

  • pos_name (str) – The position name of the image watermark.

Returns

True if the path of the reduced image exists else False.

Return type

bool

watermark_position(pos_name)[source]¶
watermark_text(text, color, font_type, font_size, pos_name)[source]¶

Write text on the image.

Parameters

  • text (str) – The text to write on the image.

  • color ((int, int, int)) – The color of the text.

  • font_type (str) – The font type of the text.

  • font_size (int) – The font size of the text.

  • pos_name (str) – The position name of the text.

Returns

True if the path of the reduced image exists else False.

Return type

bool
